query:
UPDATE prover_jobs_fri
                SET
                    status = 'queued',
                    updated_at = NOW(),
                    processing_started_at = NOW(),
                    priority = priority + 1
                WHERE
                    (id, chain_id) IN (
                        SELECT
                            id,
                            chain_id
                        FROM
                            prover_jobs_fri
                        WHERE
                            (
                                status IN ('in_progress', 'in_gpu_proof')
                                AND processing_started_at <= NOW() - $1::INTERVAL
                                AND attempts < $2
                            )
                            OR (
                                status = 'failed'
                                AND attempts < $2
                            )
                        FOR UPDATE
                        SKIP LOCKED
                    )
                RETURNING
                id,
                chain_id,
                status,
                attempts,
                circuit_id,
                error,
                picked_by
